articles.title: Pfizer, Moderna, J&J: When will foreign vaccines be available in India? - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The Centre has clarified that while talks are on with Pfizer, Moderna, J&J, buying vaccine from abroad is not like buying "off the shelf" items as these companies too have limited supply and they have their preferences. | Latest News India
